name: sturdily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is physically strong and solid or thick, and therefore unlikely to break or be hurt: We could see the boat was sturdily built/constructed. Nuclear plants have to be constructed sturdily enough to withstand an aircraft impact.
literary in a way that is strong and determined: He took his place on the witness stand sturdily. She is sturdily loyal to her family. See
sturdy
More examplesFewer examplesKids will love reading this sturdily made book.Morales is a sturdily built man with long brown hair.The author follows sturdily in her mother's footsteps.The book is rigorously researched and sturdily written.
